title: Ep 2479 - Tappu Sena Obliges
shortDesc: Sonu is furious after finding out what Tappu Sena did with Sakaram. She asks them to complete their punishment and record the video. Bhide is pleased to know that Tappu Sena realizes their mistake and have learned from it.

title: Ep 2480 - Jethalals Misery
shortDesc: Baga is in urgent need of money and asks Jethalal to lend him 5 lac rupees. Jethalal is startled hearing the amount and asks Baga the reason for the loan. When Baga refuses to tell the reason, Jethalal refuses to approve the loan.

title: Ep 2481 - The Robbery
shortDesc: Jethalal signs a deal with a company and decides to give Baga the loan. When Jethalal returns to his shop, he finds it locked. When Nattu Kaka arrives and opens the shop, Jethalal is shocked to find the shop robbed. Who has robbed Jethalal’s shop?

title: Ep 2482 - The Investigation Begins
shortDesc: Jethalal calls up Taarak and informs him that his shop has been robbed. Taarak asks Jethalal to file a police complaint. Jethalal picks up the phone and calls up Chalu Pandey and narrates him the incident.

title: Ep 2483 - Bagas Celebration
shortDesc: Jethalal accuses Baga of robbery and Chalu Pandey suspects Bavri’s involvement in the crime. Later, Baga arrives at the shop with a box of sweets. Jethalal is enraged seeing Baga celebrating while his shop has been ransacked.

title: Ep 2484 - Bagas Loyalty
shortDesc: Baga informs Jethalal that he hasn't stolen the goods from the shop but in fact sold it all to an MLA. Jethalal realizes his mistake and as a reward for Baga's loyalty decides to give him the loan, which Baga desperately needs.

title: Ep 2485 - Reward for Loyalty
shortDesc: Taarak rushes to Gada Electronics and finds Jethalal in an unusually calm demeanor.  Jethalal reveals that Baga didn't steal any goods from his shop and it was all a misunderstanding.

title: Ep 2486 - Sodhis Secret
shortDesc: Roshan Sodhi asks his wife Roshan to sit beside him as he has to share a secret. But, Sodhi informs her that he will reveal the secret at a given time. Roshan cannot wait and follows her husband and cajoles him to reveal the secret.

title: Ep 2487 - Peek into the Future
shortDesc: Roshan is worried about the secret Sodhi is about to share. She calls a meeting with the ladies of Gokuldham society and shares her worries. Roshan is worried as she feels the Sodhi will divorce her.

title: Ep 2488 - Whats the Secret?
shortDesc: Roshan visits a foreteller to find out the secret Sodhi is going to reveal. The foreteller proves to be of no help. Then, Anjali comes up with a plan and asks Roshan to fake an illness so that Sodhi will reveal the secret.

title: Ep 2489 - The Secret
shortDesc: Roshan has a secret and the all of the Gokuldham residents are going crazy figuring it out! As per Roshan they can only get to know about it at eight thirty at night. Watch and find out what’s the secret!

title: Ep 2490 - United By Love
shortDesc: As the women of Gokuldham society discuss over what Roshan has to say, the men discuss about the party that awaits them. Watch how the story unfolds in tonight’s episode!

title: Ep 2491 - Sodhis Suspense
shortDesc: All of the resients of Gokuldham society are going crazy trying to figure out what Sodhi is hiding from them, finally the mahila mandal takes help from Cha Cha Ji. They find Sodi praying. Watch to figure out what happens next!

title: Ep 2492 - Three Magical Words
shortDesc: Sodhi finally reveals the secret to his wife, Roshan. Sodhi gets down on his knees and expresses his love to Roshan. Sodhi's wife is enraged as she expected something else.

title: Ep 2493 - Budget
shortDesc: Bhide and his wife discuss their financial plans and take care of the budgets. They talk about Sonu’s future and marriage, while Tappu drops in and heats up the conversation as usual. Watch to find out!
